choose - Variable in class stream.ClientThread
 
chooseUsers() - Method in class stream.ClientThread
A Method that allows to choose the users we want to communicate with in a group.
clicked - Variable in class stream.MainPage
 
ClientThread - Class in stream
CLientThread is the thread that allows the sending of the messages The CLientThread is composed of: A Socket that contains the message. A BufferedReader that reads the message inside the socket. A PrintStream that writes the message inside the socket and sends it to the other user A pseudo that identifies the user A static list of clientThreads to identify all the clientThreads that are logged in A diffusion list of clientThreads to identify all the clientThreads that we are sending messages to A boolean to know if we are in the general conversation A boolean to know if the user was chosen by another user to conduct a conversation A file that allows to store the history of the general chat A printwriter to allow the writing inside a file
ClientThread(Socket) - Constructor for class stream.ClientThread
class constructor.
ClientThreadListener - Class in stream
ClientThreadListener is the client Thread listening and waiting for the reception of messages from other clients A clientThreadListener is composed of: A BufferedReader socIn where the messages are received An EchoClient client the client corresponding to the listener A MainPage main corresponding to the GUI window A clienThreadListener is created for each client connected to the App When a client connects to the App this thread allows them to receive messages.
ClientThreadListener extends from Thread
closeEverything(Socket, BufferedReader, PrintStream) - Method in class stream.ClientThread
A Method that Closes everything we opened
closeServerSocket() - Method in class stream.EchoServerMultiThreaded
Closes the serverSocket
conversation() - Method in class stream.ClientThread
A Method that allows to run the general chat or the group
